title: Experienced Coach LF Team - Looking for paid work
body:
What I am looking for:
- Paid work
- Dedicated Players who Respect Authority
- Management who are not afraid to make changes
- Solid Organisation

What I offer:
- Live Coaching Analysis
- Vod Reviews
- Verbal Coaching
- Lectures (On different aspects, in game and out of game)
- Discussion
- Individual Coaching
- Role Coaching
- Team Coaching
- Strategic Coaching

Who am I?
- 1 Year of team and individual coaching experience, over 100 students.
- Coached 2 Challenger Teams (EU, TW Garena)
- Played in EUCS Qualifiers
- Many LAN and Online tournament wins as both player and coach
- Ex-Challenger S5 in EUW


Right now I'm focused on being a player,  but if a team offers a position to me that I find interesting, I will take up a coaching position.

replies.body: Hey mate, are you still looking for a team at the moment?
Hi there, Yes I am still looking for a team, feel free to add me in game!
